QuestData.Title: Further Investigation
QuestData.Description: I'm afraid this is a matter I must delegate to one of my operatives... someone who can work in secret. Keep the evidence with you and take it to Vindicator Yaala inside the inn.$B$BTell her I sent you and speak of this matter to no one else. We do not know who might be working for the cult.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Cultist Communique to Vindicator Yaala inside the inn in Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Speak quickly, $c. What information do you have on the cult?
